title: The Wuhan Mission
description: First in the series to come, this riveting new thriller introduces us to the female protagonist "Xue Lin", a young CIA operative. The CIA has caught wind of a terrorist plot.Young recruit, code named "Snow Forest" has come to the attention of her blue eyed handler, and she is tasked with the impossible mission to infiltrate a particular Wuhan laboratory.Aided by a potential double agent, she gets the feeling that she is being watched.The Wuhan conspiracy gets into full swing as the Chinese gear up their mandatory vaccination program.The odds are against Xue Lin as she is thrown into a deadly game of cat and mouse to stop the Chinese Communist Party from bringing down the global economy. From Langley to Wuhan, Beijing to New York and finally in Milan, how will it end?
author: Irving Waters
